row.process: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PUB.INCLUDE.READ_FILE UC4RB_DKR_FILE_PATH = UC4RB_DKR_IMAGES_FILE_PATH : print "-----Retrieving first official image information-------" : SET &STATUSFLAG# = "false" ! Get to Root : SET &ROOTHND# = XML_OPEN(STRING, &UC4RB_DKR_FILE_CONTENT#) : IF &ROOTHND# <> "" ! Get to Records : SET &RECORDHND# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&ROOTHND#) : WHILE &RECORDHND# <> "" : SET &ISOFCELEM# = XML_SELECT_NODE(&RECORDHND#, "is_official") : IF &ISOFCELEM# <> "" : SET &ISOFCELEMVAL# = XML_GET_NODE_TEXT(&ISOFCELEM#) : IF &ISOFCELEMVAL# = "true" : SET &STATUSFLAG# = "true" : print "Official Image found" : SET &NAMEELEM# = XML_SELECT_NODE(&RECORDHND#, "name") : IF &NAMEELEM# <> "" : SET &NAMEELEMVAL# = XML_GET_NODE_TEXT(&NAMEELEM#) : print "Image Name : &NAMEELEMVAL#" : ENDIF : SET &DESCELEM# = XML_SELECT_NODE(&RECORDHND#, "description") : IF &DESCELEM# <> "" : SET &DESCELEMVAL# = XML_GET_NODE_TEXT(&DESCELEM#) : print "Image Description : &DESCELEMVAL#" : ENDIF : SET &RECORDHND# = "" : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &RECORDHND# <> "" : SET &RECORDHND# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&RECORDHND#) : ENDIF : ENDWHILE : ENDIF : IF &STATUSFLAG# = "false" : PRINT 'No official image found!!' : ENDIF :XML_CLOSE
